QC.Ver01.0.description: Are tags being used for releasing software

evidence.success: The code repository uses tags for releasing new software versions
evidence.failure: The code repository does not use tags for releasing new software versions

QC.Ver01.0.hint: Git tags are a convenient way to release software. This subcriterion checks if any git tag is present in the code history. More info on it-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Basics-Tagging" target="_blank">git tagging

QC.Ver01.description: Is the latest release compliant with Semantic Versioning (SemVer) specification?

evidence.success: Latest release tag <%s> is SemVer compliant
evidence.failure: Latest release tag <%s> found, but is not SemVer compliant

QC.Ver01.hint: Latest tag must be compliant with SemVer specification

QC.Ver02.description: Are all release tags with Semantic Versioning (SemVer) specification?

evidence.success: All release tags are SemVer compliant
evidence.failure: Not all release tags are SemVer compliant

QC.Ver02.hint: Existent release tags shall be SemVer compliant for this subcriterion to be successful
